comments.body: Can you add a test case to ensure that an existing slice with this annotation has it cleared out? I think you may have had that test case covered earlier in this PR.

this was the simpler way I've found to add the new testcase with labels, the alternative is to replace 
`subsets                  []corev1.EndpointSubset` by `endpoints: *corev1,Endpoints` 
but that is a big change in terms of lines of code and I don't know if is worth the risk/effort :sweat_smile:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@		testName                 string
		subsets                  []corev1.EndpointSubset
		epLabels                 map[string]string
		endpointsDeletionPending bool
		maxEndpointsPerSubset    int32
